info.title: Crossfeed API Documentation
info.description: See https://docs.crossfeed.cyber.dhs.gov for more information about Crossfeed.

get.description: All paths under /matomo proxy to a Matomo instance, which is used to handle and process user analytics. A global admin user can access this page from the "My Account" page.
OpenAPI JSON specification for the Crossfeed API.

post.description: Returns redirect url to initiate login.gov OIDC flow
Processes Cognito JWT auth token (or login.gov OIDC callback, if enabled). Returns a user authorization token that can be used for subsequent requests to the API.
List domains by specifying a filter.
Export domains to a CSV file by specifying a filter.

get.description: Get information about a particular domain.
Get information about a particular organization.
List organizations that the user is a member of or has access to.

post.description: Enable or disable a scan for a particular organization.
Approve a role within an organization.
Remove a role within an organization.

get.description: List organizations that are set to be public.

post.description: List scantasks by specifying a filter.

delete.description: Kill a particular scantask. Calling this endpoint does not kill the actual Fargate task, but just marks the task as "failed" in the database.

get.description: Retrieve logs from a particular scantask.
Get information about a particular scan.
List granular scans. These scans are retrieved by a standard organization admin user, who is then able to enable or disable these particular scans.

post.description: Manually invoke scheduler to run scheduled scans.
Perform a search on all assets using Elasticsearch.

get.description: Get information about the current user.

post.description: Accept the latest terms of service.

get.description: Get information about a particular vulnerability.

post.description: List vulnerabilities by specifying a filter.
Export vulnerabilities to a CSV file by specifying a filter.
